attributes.action: oppose Boris Johnson's decisn to cut Black History month budget.We absolutely refuse to ACCEPT that decison and ask you to review it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Mayor of London and the Greater London Authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
